headline: Gold Stock Agnico, IBD Stock Of The Day, Breaks Out Bullishly
summary: Agnico Eagle Mines is the IBD Stock Of The Day amid furious earnings growth and surging gold prices.  On Tuesday, the gold stock flashed a bullish signal as it broke out.  Toronto-based Agnico delivered triple-digit EPS growth for a second straight quarter last month.

headline: Pomerantz Law Firm Reminds Investors with Losses on their Investment in Newmont Corporation of Class Action Lawsuit and Upcoming Deadlines - NEM
summary: NEW YORK, March 11, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Pomerantz LLP announces that a class action lawsuit has been filed against Newmont Corporation  . Such investors are advised to contact Danielle Peyton at...
